text: Otfrid Mittmann (27 December 1908 in Ruda ŚląskaRecord and German National Library) was a German mathematician. Starting in 1927, he studied mathematics and natural sciences in Göttingen and Leipzig, and got his Ph.D. in Apr 1935. He joined the Nazi movement in Oct 1929.Vita (p.10) at German Mathematical Society and published on statistical aspects of Nazi eugenics. After the war, he published in Göttingen and Bonn. ==Publications== * * * * * * * * * ==References== ==External links== * Category:20th-century German mathematicians Category:1908 births Category:Nazi Party members Category:German eugenicists Category:Year of death missing
title: Otfrid Mittmann
